QuestData.Title: Captain Gulnaku's Treasure
QuestData.Description:
<This map is poorly drawn and covered in stains, but appears to identify three possible locations where a pirate captain may have buried treasure around the Port of Zem'lan. The treasure could be at any of the three locations.
At the bottom of the map, someone scrawled an order: Set traps!>
QuestData.LogDescription: Search for Captain Gulnaku's treasure chest.
